title: Chilli lime sauce

ingredients.content: 1 lime, zest only, no white pith
2 spring onions/shallots, trimmed and cut into quarters

preparations.content: Place lime zest and spring onions/shallots into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then repeat chopping <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula again.
Add lime juice, sweet chilli sauce and fish sauce and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a sealable jar or bottle and refrigerate until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Serve Chilli lime sauce with the Steamed prawns or scallops or as an alternative to the Wasabi mayonnaise with the Asian crab cakes. It also makes a delcious marinade for roasted meats and poultry.
